biotools.summary: Framework to predict localization in life's three domains, including globular and membrane proteins (3 classes for archaea; 6 for bacteria and 18 for eukaryota). The resulting method, works well even for protein fragments. It uses a hierarchical system of support vector machines that imitates the cascading mechanism of cellular sorting.The method also accurately distinguishes membrane and non-membrane proteins.

bioschemas.name: LocTree2
